decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (2014-02-5346.2/2, 2014-02-5346.1/3, received 21 March 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the roof extensions hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear roof exension to both properties, raising ridgeline of roof, and installation of 3 rooflights to front elevation of each house
